definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver

sentences.english: The city is criss-crossed with canals.
sentences.chinese: 這座城市裏運河縱橫交錯。

sentences.english: Electric networks criss-cross the whole island.
sentences.chinese: 電線網縱橫交錯地佈滿全島。

sentences.english: Highways were ramified all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 公路縱橫交錯，遍佈全國。

sentences.english: With good wear resistance and corrosion resistance, micro-cracks criss-cross network to strengthen the film's adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 縱橫交錯的微裂紋網絡，增強油膜的附着能力。

sentences.english: The New York City–based firm of Diller Scofidio + Renfro imagined a future in which transportation and housing are more closely entwined.
sentences.chinese: 《紐約城》這部科幻片中，交通和住房縱橫交錯。

sentences.english: It is through the ordinary duties and labors of life that the fabric of society is woven.
sentences.chinese: 社會是一張網，縱橫交錯著生活和工作中的種種瑣碎。

sentences.english: Rural county - oil formed a criss-cross the road network.
sentences.chinese: 全縣鄉鄉通油路，形成了縱橫交錯的公路網。

sentences.english: Bangkok is crisscrossed by a network of klongs .
sentences.chinese: 曼谷有縱橫交錯的運河網。
在這個地區灌溉渠縱橫交錯。

sentences.english: It is the interlace weave pattern of Universal Essence.
sentences.chinese: 它是宇宙基本本質的縱橫交錯編織模式。

sentences.english: A bionical structure is a structure of combining the morphological spreads with aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 仿生結構是一種以形態展現力與美縱橫交錯的結構。

sentences.english: Strategically placed bows and sassy criss-cross detailing feature in the cheeky Edith.
sentences.chinese: 戰略地位和時髦縱橫交錯的細節展示。

sentences.english: New roads, railways and pipelines are criss-crossing continental Asia.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲大陸新的道路，鐵路和管道縱橫交錯。

sentences.english: There are crisscrossing waterways connected to the old Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal.
sentences.chinese: 這裏河道縱橫交錯，與古老的京杭運河相連。

definition: in picturesque disorder (idiom); irregular arrangement with charming effect
to be linked together/to be involved with/to collude/interconnection/involvement/collusion
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
disordered and in a mess (idiom); all mixed up and chaotic

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
scattered about like stars in the sky or chess pieces on a board (idiom); spread all over the place
